issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Implement TreeDataSource
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6378](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6378). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The TreeDataSource is required to support partitions pruning of sub-trees.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6378?focusedCommentId=16917944) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Should this just be `PartitionDataSource`?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6378?focusedCommentId=16917991) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
We're thinking of yanking PartitionDataSource and make `GetKey()/SetKey()` part of the DataSource interface directly. See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5221>
